name: PowerMan (MislavJ)
description:
Currently, this is just a prototype of game. PowerMan is FPS game with zombies. Story... you come to a desert island, where everything is strange, unusual, different. You are looking for relics several thousand years old. It is interesting for you here, you are looking forward to exploring and searching, but an unpleasant surprise awaits you. There are graves from which zombies begin to emerge. Fear overwhelms you… Suddenly you realize you have superpowers. You have become a PowerMan. You discover that you have a secret weapon against zombies in your hands. You will not destroy them, on the contrary, you will turn them into living beings. One after the other, and anotoher… Your powers grow. The more skilled you are at handling your powers, the easier it is to turn zombies into living beings. But your task is not easy, there are more and more zombies and you are required to have more and more skill, and the search for relics is becoming increasingly difficult.

Control Sheme

The controls are: W (forward), S (back), A (left), D (right) keys on the keyboard and MOUSE (direction of viewing the main character), Speace (jump), Shift + WASD (fast moving), Left Mouse Button (energy sending/bursting), Right Mouse Button (zooming).
